version_description:
1. Added NEW weapon SKINS
2. Fixed and upgraded all MAPS
3. Added JUMP and SQUAT
4. Fixed KNIFE
5. Better character physics
6. Overall game optimization
7. Optimized some GAMEPLAY elements
8. Fixed some weapon bugs

1. New third weapon - "KNIVE"
2. Added Clan system
3. Updated POWER
4. New Killstreak "TURRET"
5. New animations on battle maps
6. Updated functionality of "SHIELD" Killstreak
7. New MEDKIT which restore health and armor
8. Updated radar functionality
9. Overall game optimization

1. New animation effects on MAPS
2. Fixes of CLAN system
3. New battle mode POINT CAPTURE
4. New PROGRESS look in users Profile
5. Overall optimization
6. Fixed new Killstreak TURRET
7. Weapons fixes in battle
8. More efficient PREMIUM access
9. New game LOBBY interface

1. New Armor "Militant Armor"
2. Overall optimization
3. New Armor "Scout Armor"
4. Added NEW characteristics to Armor
5. Fixed issues and bugs

The list of changes and fixes (from version 1.53):
1. New Mercenarys skin
2. New Cops Skin
3. Added characteristics to Masks
4. New weapon SKINS
5. Fixed battle bugs
6. New Interface in Masks, Armor and Skins
7. Overall optimization
8. Upgraded Cases system
9. Updated battle rewards (CUPS and KEYS)

The list of changes and fixes (from version 1.81):
1. Improved Rewards for some Achievements
2. New battle mode Deathmatch
3. Added Daily bonus for newbies
4. Overall optimization
5. Fixed battle bugs
6. Updated Anti-Cheat

Fixed Turret issues
Fixed issue with x2 after battle reward
New game menu notifications
Upgraded Contracts interface
Added Best players to battle loading screen
Fixed player's statistics update
Overall optimization

Meet new Halloween update!
- Three new Masks
- Two new original weapon Skins
- Maps in holiday mood
- New Pumpkin grenade
- New Card

Increased servers connection stability
Better matchmaking
Fixed bugs
Overall optimization

- Overall optimization

- Please meet new Battle Pass Season 1.
Play the game. Level up. Earn rewards.
Unlock up to 40 ranks of content, earn up to 1,400 Gold bars and a lot more!
- Find new knife, Medals and Cards in Season.
- Fixed map Radar-28.
- New slot for tactical Grenades.
- New Flash grenade.
- New Knives' Skins.
- Anti-cheat system.
- Fixed Turret and other Killstreaks bug.
- Bug fixes.
- Overall game optimization.

Meet Christmas update!
- Cool Christmas Case.
- New weapon - KAC STONER LM.
- New Killstreak - Flamethrower.
- New Christmas grenade.
- Christmas masks and Cards.
